title: A Tactile Void
authors:
Pierre Tapie, Diogo Barreiros Scatamburlo, Antoine Chateauminois and
  Elie Wandersman
abstract:
We mimic the mechanical response of touch mechanoreceptors by that of a gas
cavity embedded in an elastic semi-cylinder, as a fingertip analogue. Using
tribological experiments combined with optical imaging, we measure the dynamics
and deformation of the cavity as the semi-cylinder is put in static contact or
slid against model rough surfaces at constant normal force and velocity. We
propose an elastic model to predict the cavity deformation under normal load
showing that membrane mechanical stresses are anisotropic and we discuss its
possible biological consequences. In friction experiments, we show that the
cavity shape fluctuations allow for texture discriminations.
